titleStmt.title: A discourse of divine assistance, and the method thereof shewing what assistance men receive from God in performing the condition of the promise of pardon of sin and eternal life / by W.A.
titleStmt.author: Allen, William, d. 1686.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.C. for Walter Kettilby ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Allen. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

Some pages are stained, have print show through and are faded; p. 238 has print loss in the filmed copy. Page 230-end of book photographed from Princeton Theological Seminary Library copy and inserted at the end.
